attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The high "taxation" on young drivers does not help in them attaining any career, more hinders them to the point of desperation.

Because you have to have car insurance, the companies often include 
clauses which mean they never have to pay out. Also it encourages the crime of deliberately causing accidents.

Another possibility is removal of the "named drivers" clauses and replacement by automatic 3rd party 
on any driver being made law.

All insurance companies should be reviewed by trading standards once a year.

It seems that under the current system it cannot be decided wether it is the driver that is insured or the vehicle, meanwhile the insurance companies make money for noting hand-over-fist
